q1.question: Are all games free?
q1.answer: Yes, all games on our website are completely free to play.

q2.question: Do I need to download or install anything?
q2.answer: No, all games can be played directly in your browser without any downloads or installations.

q3.question: Do the games work on mobile or tablet?
q3.answer: Yes, most of our games support mobile devices like phones and tablets.

q4.question: How do I report a problem with a game?
q4.answer: If you encounter any issues, please let us know through the contact information at the bottom of the page.
